sentences.en: As soon as the lights were out, these untiring nibblers set to work.
sentences.cn: 灯火一熄, 这些不知疲倦的爱咬东西的家伙就开始闹将起来.

sentences.en: He is an untiring campaigner for peace.
sentences.cn: 他为了争取和平不懈努力.
他的热情似乎从不减退.

sentences.en: Only firm confidence and untiring efforts is the difficult path leading to victory.
sentences.cn: 唯有坚定的信心与不懈的努力才是通往胜利的独木桥.

sentences.en: Our development is originated from untiring pursuit and unceasing innovation.
sentences.cn: 企业经营理念:我们的发展源自不懈的追求和不断的创新.

sentences.en: Our untiring commitment makes your trip the Best you've ever had.
sentences.cn: 我们永不厌倦的承诺给您带来您从未有过的最好的旅行.

sentences.en: Please provide tools for untiring the lashings . We'll return them to you after using.
sentences.cn: 请你提供捆扎工具, 使用完毕立即归还.

sentences.en: Satisfaction of customers is just our untiring pursuit!
sentences.cn: 顾客的满意是我们不懈的追求!

sentences.en: She is untiring in her effort to help the homeless.
sentences.cn: 她帮助无家可归的人从不言倦.

sentences.en: She is untiring in her efforts to help the homeless.
sentences.cn: 她帮助无家可归的人从不厌倦.

sentences.en: So , with great perseverance and untiring industry, he prospered.
sentences.cn: 因此, 他靠了自己的坚毅顽强和不懈努力发达起来了.

sentences.en: Strive for further development with untiring efforts.
sentences.cn: 以不懈的努力追求更广阔的发展.

sentences.en: They showed untiring zeal in the pursuit of truth.
sentences.cn: 他们怀着满腔热情孜孜不倦地追求着真理.

sentences.en: untiring efforts to help the homeless
sentences.cn: 帮助无家可归者的不懈努力

sentences.en: We must never be unworthy of our teachers'untiring and sincere teachings.
sentences.cn: 我们决不要辜负老师的谆谆教导.

sentences.en: With great perseverance and untiring industry, he prospered.
sentences.cn: 他靠自己的坚毅顽强和不懈努力发达起来了.

words.tran_cn: 不知疲倦的；不屈不挠的；坚持不懈的

trans.tran_cn: 不知疲倦的，不懈的，不倦，始终不懈
trans.tran_en: working very hard for a long period of time in order to do something – used to show approval
